id: Idea to Execution: Execute your Startup Ideas
name: Idea to Execution: Execute your Startup Ideas
description: A simple, easy to use Notion template to store business ideas & evaluate them using a business model. What will you get?A database to store your ideas. A linked database to store the ideas you have already evaluated.A template button called "Generate Model" that generates:a Description box where you can write your idea in detail. a blank Business Model Canvas (created by Alexander Osterwalder) to evaluate your idea.an Input box to note down the initial steps that you must complete to start t
features: A database to store your ideas.; A linked database to store the ideas you have already evaluated.; aDescription boxwhere you can write your idea in detail.; a blankBusiness Model Canvas(created by Alexander Osterwalder) to evaluate your idea.; anInput boxto note down the initial steps that you must complete to start the business.
